lead_paragraph: The Obama administration scored a victory in its drive to curb the spread of nuclear material with Belarus’s agreement to give up its nuclear fuel by 2012.
snippet: The Obama administration scored a victory in its drive to curb the spread of nuclear material with Belarus’s agreement to give up its nuclear fuel by 2012.

headline.main: Belarus to Give Up Uranium Stockpile
headline.seo: Belarus Vows to Give Up Uranium Stockpile
headline.print_headline: In Victory for U.S., Belarus to Give Up Stockpile of Highly Enriched Uranium
